cache:
We're
redefining
how ideas travel

Hello, welcome to Travelport Labs.

Travelport Labs exists to get the best, most disruptive travel products into customers’ hands faster. We’re a diverse team who believes collaborating, running lean and engaging with people is the only way to successfully bring new ideas to life.

Apply now
  • The Labs
  • Accelerator
  • Workshops
  • The Team
  • Events
  • Blog
  • Twitter

The Labs

Great ideas evolve here

Travelport Labs is our Center of Excellence focused on driving product innovation and entrepreneurial behavior across our organization. We help surface and explore new business ideas and test them in the market to see what sticks.

Our philosophy

We believe it takes diverse perspectives to shape truly game-changing ideas.

Travelport Labs is a multidisciplinary team, and we don't stop there. We pull in people from across Travelport's business, customer base, partnerships, and communities to imagine and explore new business ventures.

Customer feedback is key

Travelport Labs offers hands-on engagement with our latest prototypes and proofs of concept, allowing customers to see, try, discuss, and weigh in about which ideas they find valuable and which they don't.

We use this feedback to decide which ideas move forward, so we focus our innovation efforts on the solutions that matter most to our customers.

Interested in providing feedback on a Labs concept?

We're always looking for people to contribute to our research. Please reach out to the Travelport Labs team if you're interested in participating in an upcoming study—or send us ideas if there’s a product you want to see come to life!

Contact Travelport Labs

Accelerator

Where lean meets travel

Give your travel startup the best chance at success with our 4-month accelerator program. The Travelport Labs Accelerator is hosted in Denver, Colorado and is supported by the deepest pool of travel expertise on the planet.

We look for dedicated and energetic startup teams with the capability to build their vision. Our focus is to help you rapidly establish product-market fit, develop a passionate user base and drive product usage.

Prepare for success

Each year, the Travelport Labs Accelerator accepts a small number of travel startups into our Accelerator program. We provide the founders up to $30k in seed funding and a wealth of mentorship in exchange for a small amount of equity in their company.

We work intensively with each startup accepted to the program to help them rapidly validate their business model with real market feedback and quickly begin to gain measurable traction.

As part of our program, startups have access to the Travelport Commerce Platform and technical expertise to help them get the most out of it. We also surround teams with coaches who can help in areas like research, user experience, application development, product management, and marketing.

In addition to gaining support from our people and technology, accepted startup teams receive access to a broad range of free perks from IBM Bluemix, Rackspace, MailChimp, SendGrid, Amazon Web Services, SendHub, JumpBox, UserTesting, and many others.

Focus

The Travelport Labs Accelerator is the only startup accelerator 100% focused on travel and completely run and managed by a travel company. Travelport is a $2 billion company and has been in the travel industry for over 40 years. Our 3,000 plus employees, plus partners, investors, and customers provide us the broadest possible base of travel expertise.

Every startup in our program benefits from Travelport's reach through the connections we're able to help them establish with potential customers, partners, mentors, and other stakeholders key to their success.

Plus, we're a pretty fun bunch to work with.

Creating the next big thing in travel?

Check out the Travelport Labs Accelerator page on F6S to learn more about the program and apply.

Learn more

Workshops

Collaboration for the win

We create intentional workshop environments that allow ideas to thrive. By bringing together the best of design thinking, lean methodology and innovation games, our expert facilitators help teams explore game-changing ideas and test potential solutions in a matter of days, not weeks or months.

Why workshops?

There are real challenges in discovering and evolving new product ideas, challenges we've experienced firsthand. Whether it's feeling stuck, talking in circles, or having a difficult time building consensus, giving people a seat at the table and providing a framework for collaboration enables teams to meet these challenges head on.

There's an art to great workshops. Our facilitators bring years of experience (and a few tricks up their sleeves) to keep teams engaged, productive, customer focused, and data driven.

Idea generation

For groups looking to find their next big idea, Travelport Labs facilitates ideation workshops that tap into the expertise of your team, mash up ideas in new ways, and pinpoint game-changing solutions. We provide a framework for people to think big, take risks, and explore and test ideas in just a few days.

Our workshops are an extension of our core beliefs—we encourage breakthrough thinking, hone in on differentiating ideas using proven techniques, and mock up and test out new product concepts by involving customers throughout the process.

Customer discovery

Our Customer Discovery workshops are designed to put your ideas to the test with customers. In just four days, we’ll help you clearly articulate your value proposition, assess your business model, extract the hypotheses most critical to your success, and begin testing with potential customers.

Interested in our workshops?

We'd love to learn more about where you are in the innovation process, and how we can help.

Contact Travelport Labs

Team

​Your success is our vision -- seriously.

We're a multi-disciplinary team dedicated to helping entrepreneurs and intrepreneurs explore groundbreaking ideas and launch successful new ventures in travel.

We feel lucky to get to focus our energies on helping smart, passionate people bring about great products and innovations in the travel space-- the industry is ripe for disruption and we want to help lead the next wave of change!

Hannah Drain

As program manager at Travelport Labs, Hannah orchestrates everything from the application process to the curriculum to events and a multitude of other items in between. She came to Travelport from the Global Accelerator Network and brings insights from her CU Boulder Masters of Arts in Communication studies, which were focused on startup communities and accelerators.

Hannah is curious and passionate about solving problems and travel. Hannah likes yoga, climbing, running, food (especially a big bowl of pasta post-yoga), martinis, and her awesome adventure companion, her Bernese Mountain Dog. Hannah tweets @hdraino.

 

Nathan Bobbin

Nathan is Travelport's Senior Director of Product Innovation and a veteran tech product manager. He leads the multi-skilled Travelport Labs team focused on empowering Travelport intrapreneurs and travel entrepreneurs across the globe as they work to bring their visions of new travel products and services to life.

Nathan believes that innovation is not limited to the magically creative, but is an intellectual pursuit accessible to anyone with ample domain knowledge, a passion for solving hard problems, and the ability to honestly listen to market feedback.

Outside the office Nathan enjoys spending time with his family and enjoying the Colorado outdoors. He is an all-around baseball geek who can often be found on a little league field helping out with his son's baseball team or at Coors Field cheering on the Rockies. When stuck inside, Nathan enjoys getting repeatedly headshot in the FPS du jour or playing sim and fantasy sports. Find Nathan on twitter @nbobbin.

Rich Grote

In his role as Program Manager, Rich helps travel startups create solid businesses that solve real customer problems and achieve meaningful traction. His past experiences as startup founder (5x), Techstars alumnus, and innovation facilitator and trainer for a variety of companies including Microsoft, Disney, Deloitte, and Home Depot give him a keen ability to provide coaching, insight, and encouragement. Rich also manages the Travelport Labs mentor network and helps connect founders with great travel and startup mentors.

Rich is a life and coffee enthusiast and enjoys running and biking with his family on Boulder trails. Catch up with Rich on twitter @heyrich.

Brittany Bach

As Community Manager for Travelport Labs, Brittany captures and shares stories of ideation and entrepreneurship and is on a mission to raise awareness of Travelport Labs resources including workshops and the accelerator program. She is a content marketing and social media devotee and her marketing background includes a variety of products and services ranging from software to ice cream.

Motivated startup founders, yoga, cooking paleo, community, and exploring the outdoors are the inspiration and fuel for her creativity. She is unashamed of her love for Savasana, copyediting and baking, in that order. Brittany tweets @TravelportLabs and @BritEli.

Events

 

 

CLASS OF 2018

 

Apply now

 

 

DEMO DAY

October 26

Tickets

 

 

 

Back to Travelport

Tweets by @TravelportLabs
